وسوى ø ذلك ø إنّني سيّرت لك
الحميلات
ثلپپن الثه كل شى حپده
فا اللّه اللّه ساعة وصول وصولها لك إليك الّذي ø
لا تخلّيها تقعد ساعة واحدة
تبيعها تبعها بما طعّم اللّه ورزق
فنحن نطلب نكري بها حمولة
كبيرة ونسيّرها للمولا وما سيّرنا
هذه إلّا تساعدنا على الّذي فا اللّه
اللّه لا تخلّي إلّا تسيّر لي تمنها
صحبة خضر الصّبي الحمّال
ولا تأخذ لنا تمنها إلّا ذهب مصري
وانتقده جيّد لا يكون فيه ذهب
مكّي لا يكون إلّا مصري وتربط
كل شي عزلة وتسلّمه لخضر
فا اللّه اللّه ما تحتاج يحتاج وصّيه وصيّة
ومهما احتاج المولا من الحاجة
فتكتب لي مع الحمّالين رقعة
لحوائجك بحوائجك أسيّر ولمّا يصل لك
من الغلّة بما أمر تسيّر لنا مل التّمن
والسّلام عليك ورحمة اللّه وبركاته

His servants al-Muẓaffar and Abū
Bakr
In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
[write to inform] Shaykh Abū Mufarrij - may God prolong
his life and make his strength and happiness everlasting! -
[........ that] I have dispatched to you
[.............. in] small loads
[...... a total of] thirty; [and that] everything shipped to him (i.e., you) is of good quality.
By God, by God! as soon as the aforesaid [shipment] arrives, By God, by God! as soon as the aforesaid [shipments] arrives,
don't let it sit idle, not a second! don't let it sit idle, not even a moment!
Sell it, as God so feeds and provides. Sell it, as God so provides.
We would like to rent a large cargo ship We would like to rent a large carrier [for the merchandise]
and dispatch it to the Master. [But] we will not dispatch it and dispatch it to [you] the Master. [But] we will not send it out ... We will not dispatch the shipment ... We won't dispatch the shipment
unless you help us out with the aforesaid [shipment]. By God, unless you help us out with the aforesaid [transaction). ... unless you would help us out on account of the aforesaid [shipment]. By God,
by God! all you need to do is send me the down payment, by God! all you need to do is send me the down payments,
to be accompanied by Khiḍr the young porter.
Don't accept, on our behalf, the payments unless [they are paid in] Egyptian gold [dinars]. Don't accept the payments on our behalf unless [they are paid in] Egyptian golden [dinars].
Cash the money carefully: No Meccan
gold [dinars]. Egyptian dinars only. Wrap golden [dinars]. Egyptian dinars only. Wrap ... Wrap
everything separately and hand it all to Khiḍr. everything separately and hand it all to Khiḍr [the porter].
By God, by God! anything you want, let [me] know. By God, by God! He (i.e. you, the master) does not need any further instructions.
Whatever [you,] the Master need,
write me a memo [and send it] through the porters;
I will ship off your orders. Upon the delivery
of the crops as ordered hereby, you should send us the full payment.
Peace be upon you. God's mercy and blessings.
The service was commissioned [..........]
Shaykh Abū Mufarrij to [................]
